:afterClose.description: Specify a function that will be called when modal is closed completely.
:afterClose.description_zh: Modal 完全关闭后的回调

:bodyStyle.description: Body style for modal body element. Such as height, padding etc.

closable.description: Whether a close (x) button is visible on top right of the modal dialog or not
closable.description_zh: 是否显示右上角的关闭按钮

confirmLoading.description: Whether to apply loading visual effect for OK button or not

destroyOnClose.description: Whether to unmount child components on onClose
destroyOnClose.description_zh: 关闭时销毁 Modal 里的子元素

footer.description: Footer content, set as :footer="null" when you don't need default buttons
footer.description_zh: 底部内容，当不需要默认底部按钮时，可以设为 :footer="null"

:getContainer.description: Return the mount node for Modal
:getContainer.description_zh: 指定 Modal 挂载的 HTML 节点

keyboard.description: Whether support press esc to close
keyboard.description_zh: 是否支持键盘 esc 关闭

maskClosable.description: Whether to close the modal dialog when the mask (area outside the modal) is clicked
maskClosable.description_zh: 点击蒙层是否允许关闭

okType.description: Button type of the OK button

:okButtonProps.description: The ok button props, follow jsx rules
:okButtonProps.description_zh: ok 按钮 props, 遵循 jsx规范

:cancelButtonProps.description: The cancel button props, follow jsx rules
:cancelButtonProps.description_zh: cancel 按钮 props, 遵循 jsx规范

v-model.description: Whether the modal dialog is visible or not

wrapClassName.description: The class name of the container of the modal dialog
wrapClassName.description_zh: 对话框外层容器的类名

:dialogStyle.description: Style of floating layer, typically used at least for adjusting the position.
:dialogStyle.description_zh: 可用于设置浮层的样式，调整浮层位置等

dialogClass.description_zh: 可用于设置浮层的类名

events.name: cancel
events.description: Specify a function that will be called when a user clicks mask, close button on top right or Cancel button
events.description_zh: 点击遮罩层或右上角叉或取消按钮的回调

events.name: ok
events.description: Specify a function that will be called when a user clicks the OK button
